Package com.project.SmartHomeSimulator.api

Class SmartHomeHeatingController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.project.SmartHomeSimulator.api.SmartHomeHeatingController
  • @RestController
@CrossOrigin(origins="*")
@RequestMapping("api/v1/simulation")
public class SmartHomeHeatingController
extends java.lang.Object
    API controller for everything related to the heating process
